name: Terraform Mars
description:
Terraform a planet! You control a rocket and collect materials floating in space in order to terraform a planet. But watch out and don’t run out fuel. Collect dilithium crystals and then land on the landing pad in order to refuel.

Controls:

Upward/downward thrust: W/S or up/down arrow keys

Left/right rotation: A/D or left/right arrow keys

Extend/retract asteroid grabber: Space or E

Tips:
  • Hitting anything with you rocket depletes your fuel (hitting with asteroid grabber doesn’t count).
  • Asteroids disappear on impact with planet. Fuel and Biomatter only at higher velocity.
  • Planets fuel tank can store up to 3 times as much fuel as your ship.
  • You can land sideways on the landing pad.
  • Use planets gravity to your advantage when dropping stuff in the funnel.
  • One dilithium crystal is equal to a 130% of ships fuel tank.
